sentences: Ta teatas eelnevalt, et ei saa osaleda.
Eelnevalt oli olnud palju keerulisi hetki.
Eelnevalt kavandatud plaanide muutmine v√µtab aega.
context: The word eelnevalt is an adverb in Estonian that means doing something beforehand or previously, it is commonly used to indicate that an action was taken before something else happened.
